name: Zoviz
description: Zoviz is an AI-powered platform for creating unique logos and comprehensive brand kits instantly.
longDescription: Zoviz is an innovative AI-driven branding platform designed to simplify the creation of professional logos and complete brand identities for businesses, freelancers, and startups. By leveraging advanced artificial intelligence, it generates unique, high-quality logo designs and branding assets tailored to a userâ€™s business name, industry, and style preferences. The platform eliminates the need for expensive designers or extensive design skills, offering a user-friendly interface that delivers results in minutes. Zoviz supports over 100 languages, ensuring culturally relevant designs for global markets, and provides lifetime access to assets for ongoing customization. Its mission is to empower users to establish a strong, consistent brand presence affordably and efficiently, making professional branding accessible to all.
features: AI-powered logo generation creates unique, professional logos tailored to your brand in seconds.
Comprehensive brand kits include high-resolution logos, business cards, letterheads, and social media assets for cohesive branding.
Supports over 100 languages, enabling culturally appropriate designs for global audiences.
Offers scalable vector files (SVG, EPS) and high-resolution PNG/JPG for versatile use in print and digital media.
User-friendly interface requires no design skills, making branding accessible to all users.
Lifetime access allows users to edit, rebrand, or download assets without additional costs.
Provides a brand style guide to ensure consistent use of colors, fonts, and logos across platforms.
Customizable social media assets optimize logos for platforms like Instagram, YouTube, and Facebook.
Exclusive icon designs crafted by Zoviz ensure brand uniqueness without recycled templates.
24/7 customer support via email and live chat assists users throughout their branding journey.

faqs.question: What is included in a Zoviz brand kit?
faqs.answer: A Zoviz brand kit includes high-resolution logos (PNG, JPG, SVG, PDF), business cards, letterheads, email signatures, social media assets, favicons, and a comprehensive brand style guide.

faqs.question: Is Zoviz free to use?
faqs.answer: Zoviz offers free logo creation and previews, but downloading high-resolution files and accessing the full brand kit requires a paid package, starting at $19.99/month for the basic logo pack.

faqs.question: Can I edit my logo after purchasing?
faqs.answer: Yes, Zoviz provides lifetime access to your brand assets, allowing you to tweak colors, fonts, or rebrand without additional fees via the Zoviz Brand Dashboard.

faqs.question: Does Zoviz support multiple languages?
faqs.answer: Yes, Zoviz supports over 100 languages, creating culturally relevant logos and branding materials for global markets.

faqs.question: Do I own the logo after purchasing?
faqs.answer: Yes, once purchased, you have full ownership rights to your logo, with the Elite package offering exclusive ownership and transferable rights for trademarking.

faqs.question: Can I use Zoviz logos for commercial purposes?
faqs.answer: All Zoviz packages include a full commercial license, allowing unlimited use of logos and brand assets across all media and platforms.

faqs.question: How long does it take to create a logo with Zoviz?
faqs.answer: Zoviz generates logo options in seconds after you input your brand name, industry, and preferences, with customization taking just a few minutes.
